channel.title: NEED A TEAM! NovaX Development Team!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc464/skat3rboy21/NovaX-banner1.png[/img]
[b]TO APPLY FOR ANY POSITION SEND THE APPLICATIONS TO EMAIL BELOW THANKS[/b]
Server: NovaX Status: Recruiting also need staff members!
Graphic design apps go to - skat3rboy4@hotmail.com
Coder/web design apps go here - z_zodiace1rules@yahoo.com
All mod/admin/modeler apps or apps for anything not mentioned such as publicity, movie design, music creation, and anything else are to go to - novax-indev@hotmail.com
Application Form: Name: Msn: How much time will you be working: Experience: Apply For:
[IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc464/skat3rboy21/NovaX-wallpaper-new.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc464/skat3rboy21/NovaX-pic2.png[/img]

item.title: NEED A TEAM! NovaX Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“yugioh101, post:13, topic:402809”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=499870.msg3658232#msg3658232 date=1310173676]

SkylAr, knock it off… I saw you posted on the charity server too…

Anyway, good luck! If ya need help just add me on MSN.

yeh so what i put in multiple applications, if you have ever had a real job you would know about this. do you put in one application and wait for them to get back? no u put in multiple and hopefully get one faster.
[/quote]Mate, not real life. The thing is, on communities like this, most people remember your name. If you get hired on more than one project, and ya only wanted to be on one, and you screw one over, that person will remember you AND will most likely bad mouth you. Trust me mate. I know someone who did that.

can we please stop getting off topic, and ranting on this forum if your going to rant do it somewere else.[/quote]Not ranting mate, warning ya. Ignore me if ya want

Read full topic

item.title: NEED A TEAM! NovaX Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“R4z0rb14d3, post:5, topic:402809”]All RsPS’s start the same. The only reason they are all so similar is because most of the people who run them are between the ages of 10-13 and don’t know that first thing about programming. You can almost always tell this if:

  1. They forgot to take out the “Welcome to Project Insanity” loading bar, or whatever source it is.
  2. It’s based almost entirely in Edgevile, and players only leave to go to generic training areas, or a poorly coded Pest control/Assault.
  3. They have bandos capes, or any other models the find on mopar in an attempt to look skilled.

So far this server doesn’t have massive amounts of any of those, so I think it has a good chance.[/quote]
actually they’re 9, they get dick and dildo models, and d3y sm0ke 4ll.
but at least post pictures.

Read full topic
item.source: NEED A TEAM! NovaX Development Team!

item.title: NEED A TEAM! NovaX Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @R4z0rb14d3 R4z0rb14d3
item.description:
@R4z0rb14d3 wrote:

All RsPS’s start the same. The only reason they are all so similar is because most of the people who run them are between the ages of 10-13 and don’t know that first thing about programming. You can almost always tell this if:

  1. They forgot to take out the “Welcome to Project Insanity” loading bar, or whatever source it is.
  2. It’s based almost entirely in Edgevile, and players only leave to go to generic training areas, or a poorly coded Pest control/Assault.
  3. They have bandos capes, or any other models they find on mopar in an attempt to look skilled.

So far this server doesn’t have massive amounts of any of those, so I think it has a good chance.

Read full topic

Remove that nasty nova x thing that goes across the client
remove the 2 icons in the bottom right corner

take pics of unique stuff not barrows how is that unique?

Otherwise goodluck.
